title: Jerzy
text: Jerzy is the <a href="Polish%20language">Polish</a> version of the masculine given name <a href="George%20%28given%20name%29">George</a>. The most common nickname for Jerzy is <a href="Jurek%20%28given%20name%29">Jurek</a> (), which may also be used as an official first name. Occasionally the nickname Jerzyk may be used, which means "<a href="Common%20swift">swift</a>" in Polish.
